Name: minimize_total_budget
Description: Reduce overall project spending across all projects

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Increase total available capacity across workers

Description: Lower the summed severity of all active blockers

Description: Increase average story points per sprint

Description: Deliver items with highest stakeholder relevance

Description: Maximize number of sprints achieving their goals

Description: Reduce time spent in sprint planning meetings

Name: maximize_backlog_freshness
Description: Keep backlog current by maximizing update frequency
